channel.title: Mikka's happenings 📒
channel.description: Random thoughts and happenings in my life.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #285
item.description: Back in 2017-2018 I barely knew how to talk to strangers and socialise. And now im here, doing things younger me would never think of doing

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #284
item.description: But I’ve made lots of progress since when I decided to work on myself.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #283
item.description: To clarify, it’s especially hard to get used to when you’ve been a recluse for the bigger part of your life.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #281
item.description: I am currently working around 6 days a week. I hope to keep it up as it pays well. But im not sure if it’s making me happier mentally.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #280
item.description: I was browsing in the Apple Store and the salesperson was really cute, so I ended up buying an Apple Watch 😭

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #279
item.description: Enjoying the evening

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #278
item.description: I got assigned a new project the company is working on. It’s pretty exciting considering it’s a lot of new stuff when it comes to framework, languages etc. I’ve written a writeup at https://notes.cvyl.me/Studies/Apprenticeship/2024/Brainstorming/Laravel+SaaS+Analytics+Application/Analytics+Project+Creation

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #277
item.description: To be honest, I can't wait for Winter to arrive. It has always been a nice time. Although I love nature in it's uncovered beauty, I also appreciate the calm of winter.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #276
item.description: It's a bad coping mechanism, but I will try to keep it up for now. As I'd rather be busy with something I feel like I'll earn more from than staying behind in my own thoughts.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #274
item.description: It's a lame excuse. I work over 50 hours total a week. As my mind is simply programmed to believe that when I am not doing something productive, I am doing something useless.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #273
item.description: I think the reason I keep myself so busy and I have so much to do is because me working hard takes my mind off the issues that are really playing in my head.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #272
item.description: I've been so busy... I am so tired, when I get home I kind of collapse

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #271
item.description: I started my own company, already have a client.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #270
item.description: I’ll remind myself to come back to this and update it later

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #269
item.description: I’ll keep you up to date!!!

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #268
item.description: Been so busy with things aaaaa

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #267
item.description: I did it!!!!

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #266
item.description: I’ve been working on smaller projects again next to my apprenticeship.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #265
item.description: I feel ghosted by others. Why is it that they won’t message me back? Was it something I did wrong?

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #264
item.description: 如何摆脱消极的想法？

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #263
item.description: Boss said he’s proud of me, and that I should he proud of myself.. I’ll try to be, thank you.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #262
item.description: Today’s weather is really nice. I went for a walk

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #261
item.description: I figured out the reason I don’t hang out with people from social media anymore

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #259
item.description: It’s an iphone 15 pro.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #258
item.description: I got myself the new iPhone!! Really nice using it

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #257
item.description: Working on hosting a smaller sub domain where I save notes from my iPad to: https://notes.cvyl.me

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #256
item.description: Hope everyone is doing well!

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #255
item.description: I am feeling a bit better today. Also, today marks 16 months sober 🎉

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #254
item.description: I haven’t really eaten anything the past two days

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #252
item.description: I’ve been suffering from Viral gastroenteritis since a few days ago. It really makes me fragile and I am barely able to do anything

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #251
item.description: I'll be sure to recommend them to friends.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #250
item.description: I have been finding a lot of enjoyment by playing puzzle and mystery games on Steam from small developers.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #249
item.description: It’s so hot outside today, I feel like I am gonna melt.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #247
item.description: I'm feeling really accomplished and happy today. Probably also because my meetup went well.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #246
item.description: I might work on a few side projects as well, for example. HWU. I feel like I've let down the small circle of people within it. But I am overthinking it.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #245
item.description: It's not negative in that regard, but just, a lot.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #244
item.description: I'm not feeling too well. I think I'll call in sick. I'm just a bit exhausted and need some time off to process things. Life has been going fast lately..

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #242
item.description: I feel so let down. I waited the whole week for this.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #241
item.description: I was really excited to meet up with a friend I really like, just for them to cancel the meeting the same day it was agreed upon.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #240
item.description: Although I am in remission for depression, suicidality still happens every so often.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #238
item.description: Using the correct restroom is scary, when using the incorrect one I feel unsafe and when using the correct one I am afraid to be yelled at..

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #237
item.description: I sometimes am afraid of forgetting things

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #236
item.description: Insecurities are such an interesting phenomenon

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #234
item.description: Going to meet an online friend. It’s a long train ride but hopefully it’ll be worth it.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #232
item.description: Taking the day off the internet today. Don’t feel like interacting with anyone. I’ll be doing some chores around the house and mow the neighbour’s lawn.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #231
item.description: Debating the right of my existence with people makes me feel like this world isn't for me.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #230
item.description: My throat is really sore, I am sick

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #229
item.description: I got the news that our female neighbour died a few days ago. Not long after her husband died

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #228
item.description: My apprenticeship starts somewhere 29th

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #227
item.description: College has ended for now (holidays). I hope to freshen up my mind with some relaxation and studying of some Web Frameworks.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #226
item.description: In my dreams I keep being in the same dream every night. It’s a different world where life’s concepts are completely different.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #224
item.description: Being harassed sucks. Being beaten up over it too.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #223
item.description: Ive been missing college a bunch because I have been focusing on getting ready for internships and such. Other than that I haven’t been able to be as active on my GitHub due to some personal issues

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #222
item.description: Google couldn't offer the apprenticeship... Oh well.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #221
item.description: I arrived two hours early at college aaaa...

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #220
item.description: My mother got me a new T-Shirt, I think it's pretty

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #219
item.description: It’s been a while, I’ve been working a lot, both on my studies / academics and on myself.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #218
item.description: After a few months I decided to get a new phone wallpaper

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #216
item.description: First interview went well!! If my second interview goes as well as the first one then I’ll be an apprentice at Google September this year

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #215
item.description: Google reached out for my apprenticeship application. A bit anxious as I have an interview this Friday via Google Meets

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #213
item.description: After some time, im picking up my kung fu and taichi studies again. Sifu still welcomes me

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #211
item.description: Once I have collected my thought's I will work on my school project https://short.moe again

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #210
item.description: I will look more to the bright side of life.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #209
item.description: Collecting my thoughts.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #208
item.description: I've been taking a short break from programming.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #206
item.description: A good friend of mine was playing an old Minecraft server and found my cat in the town house. Now with candles in memory of her passing

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #205
item.description: I’m a bit burnt out so I’ll be taking the day off tomorrow

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #204
item.description: Applying for internships too, and more.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #203
item.description: I haven’t been actrice for a few days because I was busy with some school and side projects.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #201
item.description: I am sure it'll be ok.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #200
item.description: Been feeling ups and downs recently.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #198
item.description: The sky is pretty

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #197
item.description: Found this iPad in the battery bin at the GP today. Thought it was broken or such as all things in those bins are getting burned. But to my surprise it was still fully functional and without any sort of activation lock. Very interesting find!!

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #196
item.description: Happy pride month to everyone celebrating it

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #194
item.description: It would make the site more organised.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #193
item.description: I think for my continuation in my Chinese studies, I will make a new subdomain to my website and launch a Mandarin only blog/feed there.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #192
item.description: Having lots of cramps at the moment. Mum made me a hot water bottle to help

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #191
item.description: I have a hormone level checkup tomorrow. Almost forgot to do that this month

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #190
item.description: Wishing everyone a nice day

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #189
item.description: Fiddling around with Next.JS and some tutorials is fun but very hard. I’m new to all of this but I’m sure ill figure it out

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #188
item.description:
Trying to pick up Next.JS, might be more reliable than smaller projects.

Learning new things is always frustrating because you try to do something you just can’t do yet

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #186
item.description: It’s been going better. Still haven’t picked up my Mandarin Chinese studies again which is unfortunate, but I have been working on my German as that’s significantly easier for me as my native tongue shares over 70% of the vocabulary.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #185
item.description: Dysphoria and dysmorphia hitting hard lately.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #184
item.description: Life’s routine is picked up again. Other than my current living situation im doing fine

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #183
item.description: I’m starting to feel happier I think in general.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #181
item.description: To whoever is celebrating it, happy Mother’s Day!

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #180
item.description: Watching EuroVision, 12 points to Belgium in my opinion!!

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #179
item.description:
I used to know a kid back in highschool, he got from a rough place and managed to leave highschool early to pursue his career in music and beat making. Years ago when I last saw him he decided to chat with me about life and such and showed that he’ll be travelling outside the country to work for a label or something and was proud of his gym progress getting jacked.

I sometimes wonder what happened to him, we never exchanged phone numbers nor were we really considered friends. I hope life is treating him well now and that he made his dreams come true.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #178
item.description: I didn’t get into too much detail in my article about IPFS about how smart contracts works and such, but I hope to make a revised version.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #177
item.description: A lot of people in the tech scene seem to be misinformed about “new” technology like cryptography and the impact it could have on the internet as whole once it’s fully ready to be used by the wider market. Web3 mostly gets a bad reputation because people think of the word “crypto” as “cryptocurrency” even though cryptocurrency does not play a role in this at all.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #175
item.description: I’m wishing everyone a beautiful day today

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #174
item.description: People at the pharmacy are always so kind

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #173
item.description: I haven’t gotten myself to study Mandarin again… I have been working on my German though.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #172
item.description: Feeling like passing out every few seconds. It’s probably a protective measure of my body.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #171
item.description: I’ve been experimenting with sugar waxing and regular wax. Works very well and I even bought a small heater for it. It’s a lot of work though…

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #169
item.description:
Uh oh, I’ve ran out of medications to regulate my serotonin levels…

Pharmacy is closed until Monday 😭

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #168
item.description: Been feeling down a bit due to my current living situation.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #167
item.description: 中文是美丽的语言

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #166
item.description: 我想继续学习普通话

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #164
item.description: I could really use a shower right now

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #163
item.description: I’ve been working on the yard cleaning 50+ year old walls with pressure washing. Spent a good 4-5 hours on it, now fully covered in dirt and mud but it’s looking very pretty.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #162
item.description: Got a letter in the mail dr the hospital where they got my name wrong and it was handwritten on the envelope from the Gender Team department of the hospital. Really ironic considering they have my medical documents >_>

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #161
item.description: Finished running, didn’t run too much, about 7KM maybe? But I am trying to build up my stamina to eventually run over 10KM..

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #160
item.description: I forgot how exhausting running is.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #158
item.description: It’s a sunny day outside so I will be running

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #157
item.description: I hope to talk more here as well. It's nice to look back at my older messages and seeing how my life has changed so far.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #156
item.description: I also totally forgot to show this!! Currently at 377 days and hope to get to 400.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #155
item.description: I made some new online friends with a fate similar to mine which is nice!! I've also started picking up my older hobbies again.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #154
item.description: My brother acknowledged his verbal abuse towards me and my relatives. I already thought it was because of his final exams he wanted to pass, but it’s still nice he himself acknowledges that.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #151
item.description: Thought my nail-polish fitted my running outfit, but I am colourblind so I might be incorrect.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #150
item.description: I went running a few days ago, it was fun! I have some pictures.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #149
item.description: I am also coming more to terms with my identity, which is something I haven't experienced much.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #148
item.description: The divorce between my parents is also seemingly going more smoothly.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #147
item.description: Overall, life is getting stabler and more bearable, I really did not expect it all to work out in this way, and I am starting to understand what feeling proud of oneself means.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #146
item.description:
I hope to go to university soon.

I need some internship hours (mandatory) in order to graduate two years earlier than you're supposed to.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #145
item.description: College has been going well! Quite glad, made new connections / friends. I like most of my tutors(?) and it's all pretty easy due to my circumstances.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #144
item.description: But luckily, I am still alive..

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #143
item.description: I am sorry for not actively posting here. Have been a lot of changes in my life.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #142
item.description: Sugary water is sticky, it sucked.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #141
item.description: A few days ago someone threw soda at me while I was biking back home. Very likely because I am not "cis-looking".

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #139
item.description: I am very new to all of this website development stuff, like working with frameworks and such.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #138
item.description: I have been soooo busy with my school assignment. I made oAuth somewhat work using GitHub but now I want to make a shopping cart system.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #137
item.description: Been looking at some better hair removal methods

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #136
item.description: Goodnight everyone, glad all is working again. I hope to update this more often.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #134
item.description: Fixed some CSS issues too so it should all look pretty again and I can use it again :3

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #133
item.description: I made the site work again!!!

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #132
item.description: I’ll make this site’s CSS work again, I apologise it’s all broken

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #131
item.description: My skin is soft

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #130
item.description: My heart is made out of glass and it shattered into a million pieces

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #129
item.description: Im heartbroken

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #127
item.description: I hope to just skip it alltogether

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #126
item.description: I am not looking forward to tomorrow at all

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #125
item.description: I have to inject on my birthday, March 10th.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #123
item.description: I apologise for readers

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #122
item.description: I’ll also update this blog feed to work properly again as it is now broken due to a recent update (theming / colours are messed up).

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #121
item.description:
Because this course is so easy for me, I might be able to do it in two years instead of four, my mentor said.

I hope I can. It’s really easy for me indeed.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #119
item.description: I gained 2-3 kilos the last year. It’s explanatory due to HRT and overall lack of exercise

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #118
item.description: Big day today, first school day, I’m anxious

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #117
item.description: Had my first intake at the gender clinic. It went well but I’m mentally exhausted

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #116
item.description: They got my name wrong on the student ID. Emailed tech support about it. Hopefully they’ll fix it before Tuesday

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #115
item.description: I’m officially a student.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #114
item.description: The teacher at the school I want to study at told me I’m overqualified haha

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #113
item.description: The world is too cruel. I have been considering giving up.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #112
item.description: I hate the cistem

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #111
item.description: Been crying my eyes out for a while

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #109
item.description: This way of thinking was the default way I thought because I grew up like this. I don’t know any better. And this still haunts me to this day

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #108
item.description: I’m one of those failures unfortunately.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #107
item.description: Talked with personal help assistant about how I grew up in an environment that was very toxic now that I think about it. If you didn’t fit in you would be excommunicated by both the parents and the children. You had to get 100/100’s at elementary school else you’d be a failure and you’d never have a future.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #106
item.description: My package from UPS arrived at the exact time I came home. What a timing!

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #105
item.description: Good morning everyone, let’s do our best today

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #103
item.description: My laptop will arrive tomorrow. Hope to make it all work

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #101
item.description: Waited about 10 months for this eeeee

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #100
item.description: I can already prepare some papers and other things I have access to, to make the processor easier for me and them.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #99
item.description: Gender polyclinic called today, I have an appointment for first intake March 4th. It kind of sucks because if my school plans work out I’ll be following lessons March 3rd but still, I am excited. I have to get up really early because it’s far away from where I live.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #96
item.description: I bought a new laptop, which will be arriving soon. It's for my studies regarding software development. It cost me around 1,5K EUR.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #94
item.description: My budding breasts are visible through my hoodie, how embarrassing….

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #92
item.description: I might be getting admitted to a psychiatric hospital. My therapist suggested it. Same for that I might be considered mentally insane.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #91
item.description: I don’t want to be alive

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #90
item.description: Police at home again, domestic abuse. It happens too often

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #89
item.description: I’m an academic failure

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #86
item.description: Bought a lot of stuff from beauty products to brushes and such. Also working on my education once more.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #85
item.description: I’m going to give life another chance.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #84
item.description: I’ve been trying to help others again. As that’s what I suppose I am destined to do.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #83
item.description: I hope the world will treat people like me gently one day.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #80
item.description: Thank you for to all my friends for keeping up with me.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #79
item.description: I wish to write some more things on my blog in the coming weeks. I have some plans to talk about new things.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #78
item.description: I wish to help others, make them feel safe, like a motherly figure. It's in my nature to help others.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #77
item.description: I will try to live for others. I have friends who don't want me gone yet.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #76
item.description:
I apologize for my frequent ramblings. I do not want to come over like this to others.

I have been making plan B's for continuing to live. It's not my top priority as plan A defeats plan B. I love all my friends.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #75
item.description: As I've stated before, I do not want to reach my birthday. It's of no use, nothing to celebrate other than my misery. I hope to donate my savings and checking balances toward health organisations that might be able to make a change.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #74
item.description: I know I will disappoint everyone around me for this. But I suppose I'll be selfish this time. Once I am ready, I will say a final goodnight.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #72
item.description: I have been feeling very depressed lately. It's becoming a problem. Departing without anyone's consent might be the best option. I need to think of a good date when everyone is gone that I can go depart peacefully. I've considered a lot of options; drugs, auto-mutilation, or departing via train. It's all so exhausting.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #70
item.description: Now it’s time to shower and off to bed

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #69
item.description: Once again, I really hate needles. But it’s life saving…

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #67
item.description: I managed to take care of myself today, I’m happy with that. I’ll be heading to bed now. Goodnight kind world.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #66
item.description: I hope to work on my school and some blog articles the coming days.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #64
item.description: Going to a hairdresser with my mom soon. I hope to get a nice haircut or such as a haircut makes all the difference. Last time (when I was growing out my hair) the barber messed up and gave me a very masculine cut. I cried my way home and at home itself. This was almost a year ago, I have been too afraid to get a haircut ever since then as it felt like my hair got assaulted. Will send an email to my clinic too. I keep forgetting to do so.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #63
item.description: I cleaned my room. It frees up your mind.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #61
item.description: I will be heading to bed, goodnight.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #60
item.description:
Played a lot of videogames today with a friend. It was fun.

Still feeling really dysphoric on a daily basis. Why must I feel such a way constantly?

I hope to get in contact with my clinic soon. The doctors can fix you, they say.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #58
item.description:
Goodnight kind and harsh world. I will stay ambivalent about you.

Goodnight to all my friends aswell. And goodnight everyone who have been suffering through the same pain.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #56
item.description: It's said it is at cisgender woman levels.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #55
item.description: My blood results came back. My levels are 391 pmol/L

item.description: New chat photo

item.description: New chat title

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #51
item.description: Very sleeeepyyyy

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #50
item.description: I have a call with my GP today about my hormone levels. I’ll see if it’s ok

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #48
item.description: I want to be a butterfly, for you. 🦋✨

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #47
item.description: Samantha you were right, metamorphosis does take a lot of time. Sometimes turning complex things down to an easier to understand concept such as metamorphosis helps a lot.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #45
item.description:
Sorry about that, I’m off my meds due to that emergency.

I’ll do my best

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #43
item.description: Wouldn’t be surprised if my blood test results came back with a 0% change in hormones in my blood.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #42
item.description: Yes I experience so so called “effects” when it comes to certain body parts. But my hair growth hasn’t decreased one bit and I think it’s just better to depart.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #41
item.description:
The 5mg/week dosage doesn’t really do anything and reality is starting to hit.

I have tried to write suicide notes before but I never end up going. But am I really that selfish?

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #40
item.description: Reality is crumbling

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #39
item.description: Been thinking of moving to Canada when I get the possibility to do so. Perhaps first finish my Compsci studies and find a remote job there.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #38
item.description: I just realised I haven’t eaten breakfast yet.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #36
item.description: I did it 😭 aaargh I hate needles

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #35
item.description: Since I have done my bloodtest, it’s time, once again.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #33
item.description: Psychiatrist called and he’ll prescribe me my medications again.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #32
item.description: The pharmacy didn’t receive anything from my psychiatrist. Called my clinic and asked if they could label it as an emergency. I’m currently on half my dosis and don’t have anything for the coming days.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #31
item.description: Bloodtest done, now going to my pharmacy for an emergency

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #30
item.description: I think a positive change is to move away from toxicity and negative spaces. Like I did months ago with some image boards with a negative aura.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #29
item.description: But I want to find happiness.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #28
item.description: I just feel sorry for taking up space in their mind of worries.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #27
item.description: My friends are so nice to me.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #26
item.description: 280 days clean today. I want to make it to 300.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #24
item.description: People close to me want me to live. I’ll try to keep it up.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #23
item.description: But I know I’d upset everyone around me for such a selfish act.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #22
item.description: Contemplating if all my medical issues and psychological issues are really worth even living.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #21
item.description: Sobered up, working on hygiene.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #19
item.description: I feel like I’m a bother to everyone.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #18
item.description: 荷兰语（母语）只有 2300 万人。那并不多。

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #17
item.description: 我一直在考虑学习中文。 但我不确定它是否比日语容易。

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #15
item.description:
She feels sorry that I am considering departing to a new life where I am normal.

I just want reincarnation to be real, please.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #14
item.description: Cried to my mother while talking suicide. I just wish i was real.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #13
item.description: And steve*, I want you to know this I am really proud of you. Please keep it up.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #11
item.description: Transgender Healthcare sure has a long way to go. I wish we had informed consent like they have overseas.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #10
item.description: I’ve been waiting for almost a year 😭

item.description: Two pictures I took yesterday during my walk:

item.description: I also hope to get in contact with my gender polyclinic.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #5
item.description: I’m currently running low on my medications. I have about one day left of antidepressants before I’ve ran out. Might need to call my psychiatrist / pharmacy for an emergency request. Because without those medications my life will be a living hell.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #4
item.description: It seems to have worked, I now need to revamp the webpage.
